text:
Text of National Security Adviser Mike Flynn’s Resignation Letter Feb 13, 2017 11:27 pm ET 
National Security Adviser Mike Flynn resigned late Monday, after coming under increasing fire over his conflicting statements about his contacts with Russian officials before the inauguration. Here is the statement from the White House announcing his resignation, followed by the text of Mr. Flynn’s resignation letter. * * * President Donald J. Trump has named […]
